data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I like apples very much, but I do not like oranges.. They ____ not ____ sweet ____ me, and I like ____ fruits. They ____ also ____ to ____. I ____ don't ____ orange ____. I only drink milk at breakfast.
data.partBlankContent: I like apples very much, but I do not like oranges.. They a__ not ve__ sweet t_ me, and I like sw___ fruits. They a__ also ha__ to e__. I al__ don't li__ orange ju___. I only drink milk at breakfast.
data.fullContent: I like apples very much, but I do not like oranges.. They are not very sweet to me, and I like sweet fruits. They are also hard to eat. I also don't like orange juice. I only drink milk at breakfast.
data.answer: 我非常喜欢苹果，但我不喜欢橘子。它们对我来说不是很甜，我喜欢甜的水果。它们也不方便吃。我也不喜欢橙汁。我早餐只喝牛奶。
